allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
chore: initialize monorepo structure

- Setup pnpm workspace configuration
- Add root package.json with workspace scripts
- Add .gitignore for node_modules and build artifacts
EOF
)")
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" run list --repo kluth/solidum --limit 5)
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" run view 18191693058 --repo kluth/solidum --log)
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" run list --repo kluth/solidum --limit 1)

Bash(timeout 60 bash -c 'while true; do ""C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe"" run list --repo kluth/solidum --limit 1 | head -1; if ""C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe"" run list --repo kluth/solidum --limit 1 | grep -q ""completed""; then echo ""Deployment completed!""; break; fi; sleep 5; done')

Bash(timeout 90 bash -c 'while true; do ""C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe"" run list --repo kluth/solidum --limit 1 | head -1; if ""C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe"" run list --repo kluth/solidum --limit 1 | grep -q ""completed""; then echo ""Deployment completed!""; break; fi; sleep 5; done')
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" repo create kluth/solidum-core --public --description "Reactive primitives and core runtime for Solidum framework")

Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" repo create kluth/solidum-utils --public --description "Utility functions for Solidum framework")
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" repo create kluth/solidum-storage --public --description "Unified storage abstraction for localStorage, sessionStorage, IndexedDB, and databases")
